deal.title: Flights to Hong Kong from $449 Return on Virgin Australia
deal.description: Virgin Australia is having a sale on flights to Hong Kong. Travel in Jul - Sep/17. Flights are direct from Melbourne.

deal.title: Hong Kong Price War! Qantas flights from $469 Return
deal.description: Qantas is having a price war with Virgin on flights to Hong Kong! Travel in Aug - Sep/17.

deal.title: Flights to Dallas (USA) from $928 Return on Qantas
deal.description: Qantas Airways are having a sale on flights to Dallas (USA). Fly between Oct-Nov17 & Jan-Mar18

deal.title: 5 Star Phuket Resort from $589 per couple for 8 nights. Normally $968.
deal.description: The 5 Star Access Resort & Villas in Phuket, Thailand is just $589 per couple for 8 nights. The resort has a 4/5 rating on Tripadvisor and 8.1 on Booking.com.

deal.title: Flights to Vietnam from $152 Return
deal.description: Jetstar is having a sale on flights to Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Travel in Oct - Nov/17, Jan - Mar/18. Some cities also have Apr - Mar/18.

deal.title: Flights to San Francisco from $874 Return on Qantas or Virgin Australia
deal.description: Qantas and Virgin Australia are having a sale on flights to San Francisco. Travel in Oct - Nov/17 and Jan - Mar/18.

deal.title: Direct Flights to Japan from $690 Return on Qantas
deal.description: Qantas is having a sale on flights to Tokyo, Japan. Travel in Oct - Nov/17 and Apr - May/17. The travel dates in April just catch the end of the Cherry Blossom Season.

deal.title: Flights to New Zealand from $295 Return on Air New Zealand
deal.description: Virgin Airways & Air New Zealand are having a sale on flights to Christchurch - Travel between Jul-Dec17 & Feb18. Advertised prices are with Virgin Australia and do not include a Bag. Add ~$10 to fly Air New Zealand
